Question: Mangdang Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Mangdang Technology Co., Limited

Product 1

- AI & Data
- MEMS and AI technology implemented to wearable devices
- Empowers visually impaired individuals with a personal and highly intelligent navigation system independent of the internet or GPS
